about_the_game:
Artifact Quest 2 is a unique mix of match-3, collapse and puzzle gameplay! Match gems and solve puzzles to decorate a tropical island and find ancient treasures.

Travel together with Jess, the archaeologist, on a fascinating journey to a tropical island decimated by a recent volcanic eruption. You can help the island's locals with the disaster by finding 7 ancient artifacts that will calm the awakened volcano. Afterward, you can begin to build a new settlement for the islanders. Solve all the riddles, brain teasers and cascade three in a row puzzles. Play mini-games, go through various levels to find new pieces of artifacts, collect trophies, and earn coins. Spend the coins to rebuild the island and meet new locals. Build and decorate a better village for the islanders!

  • Unique mix of match3, collapse and puzzle gameplay
  • Restore and decorate the tropical island
  • Collect ancient treasures, amulets and jewels
  • Meet friendly and cute characters
  • 150 fun, addictive levels
  • Play relaxing or timed mode
  • Logic game for the whole family
  • Colorful 2d graphics
  • Help Jess find 7 ancient artifacts
  • Set off on an adventure to the paradise island!

Please Note: This casual game is not a mobile port. It was built for PC and Mac.
